firewall.port_forwards_desc: Port Forwarding lets remote computers connect to a local computer or server behind the firewall in the LAN network (such as Web servers, FTP servers, etc.).
firewall.open_port_on_router_dest: The router's services, such as Web and FTP, requires opening their respective router ports in order to be publicly reachable.
firewall.dmz_desc: DMZ lets you to expose one computer to the Internet, so all inbound packets will be redirected to this computer.
firewall.dmz_tips: If you enable DMZ, your port forward and port open rules will not take effect.
firewall.name: Name
firewall.delete_all_port_tips: Are you sure you want to delete all entries?
firewall.confirm_delete_tips: Are you sure you want to delete the entry?
